function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of fake news and misinformation related to COVID-19 on social media","Impact":"Increased public confusion, anxiety, and distrust of valid information","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns, fact-checking initiatives, and promotion of credible sources","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, artificial intelligence for content verification","People":"Social media users, general public, researchers","Owner":"Government, social media companies, researchers"},{"Description":"Association between information overload and sharing unverified information on social media","Impact":"Increased dissemination of unverified information and potential panic among the public","Mitigation":"Education on critical information consumption, development of user-friendly information management tools","Technologies":"Information filtering algorithms, personalized content curation tools","People":"Social media users, general public","Owner":"Educational institutions, information technology companies"},{"Description":"Positive influences of online information trust, information overload, perceived severity, and perceived susceptibility on cyberchondria","Impact":"Increased hypochondriac behavior and anxiety among individuals","Mitigation":"Promotion of mental health literacy, access to accurate health information, and counseling services","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, mental health apps, online counseling services","People":"Individuals experiencing cyberchondria, mental health professionals","Owner":"Health organizations, mental health professionals"}]}
